snippet: Eight police officers were killed and nine were wounded when their vehicle hit a land mine that officials say was probably planted by Kurdish separatist rebels.
abstract: Eight police officers are killed and nine others injured in a landmine explosion in southeastern Turkey; officials suspect Kurdish separatist rebels are responsible for the blast.
lead_paragraph: Eight police officers were killed and nine were wounded when their vehicle hit a land mine that officials say was probably planted by Kurdish separatist rebels.

headline.seo: 8 Turkish Police Officers Killed in Explosion
headline.main: Kurdish Separatists Suspected After 8 Turkish Police Officers Are Killed in Blast
headline.print_headline: Kurdish Separatists Suspected After 8 Turkish Police Officers Are Killed in Blast
